original: intros H1 H2. unfold is_LimInf_seq. unfold is_LimInf_seq in H1. unfold is_LimInf_seq in H2. destruct l; intros eps; specialize (H1 eps); specialize (H2 eps). - destruct H1 as [H1a H1b]. destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]. split. + intros N. destruct (H1a N) as [n1 [Hn1a Hn1b]]. exists n1. split. * apply Hn1a. * intros n Hn. apply Hn1b. apply Hn. + destruct (H2b) as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply H2a in Hn. apply HN in Hn. apply Hn. - intros M. specialize (H2 M). destruct H2 as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply HN in Hn.
